title: Question On New Draft Pick
body:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/new-champ-select.html

So back when Team Builder was being tested OCE Server got it for the test phase and then later we got it turned on almost full time.

Will we be getting this new Draft Pick replacement during it's testing phase?
It would be rather important for OCE to get used to it in Normals before it is thrust upon Ranked and we have no clue on how it works.

replies.body:
To clarify, the new champ select experience is taking over Normal Draft in other regions during the initial launch.
Although OCE does not have Normal Draft, the new champ select will start testing in OCE as a separate queue.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bz1HcgLr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-04T01:11:26.162+0000)
>
> To clarify, the new champ select experience is taking over Normal Draft in other regions during the initial launch.
> Although OCE does not have Normal Draft, the new champ select will start testing in OCE as a separate queue.

Any chance that the new champ select can still stay around after testing? Or do we still not have enough numbers to support it?
I believe the new champion select experience will eventually replace blind pick as well so we will definitely have it.
Does this mean we are trading Blind pick for Normal Draft? Or are we keeping both? I happy either way as I've always preferred draft pick over blind pick.

This I am curious about as well, as the greater majority of the players I play with hate blind pick, and are of varying ranks so we can't play together in ranked draft. Having the option of normal draft back would be outstanding.
